backupSeed.backupCarefully: Please carefully write down these 15 words or copy them
backupSeed.confirmBackupInfo: You will confirm this phrase on the next screen

conditions.attention: ATTENTION: PLEASE READ CAREFULLY THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS THEY AFFECT YOUR OBLIGATIONS AND LEGAL RIGHTS, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO WAIVERS OF RIGHTS AND LIMITATION OF LIABILITY. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS DO NOT PROCEED WITH REGISTRATION AT WAVES PLATFORM
conditions.title: Terms and conditions

confirmBackup.selectWord: Please, tap each word in the correct order

deleteAccount.warn: Deleting an account will lead to its irretrievable loss!

deleteUser.warn: Deleting an account may lead to irretrievable loss of access to funds! Always make sure you have backed up your SEED.

exportKeystore.chooseAccountsDesc: Select which accounts you want to export. They will be encrypted and exported into a Keystore file
exportKeystore.passwordVerifyDesc: Please enter your Keeper password to confirm that it's really you
exportKeystore.passwordVerifyImportantNote: <attention>Attention:</attention> this password will also be used to encrypt the resulting file. If you forget it, you won't be able to restore your accounts.

forgotPassword.attentionMessage: To reset the password, you need to delete all accounts from Waves Keeper, set a new password, import each of your account again from the Seed phrase.
forgotPassword.warningMessage: If you have not saved the Seed phrase or Private key, then you will not be able to recover access to your account.
forgotPassword.continueMessage: To continue, type this into the field below

importKeystore.chooseAccountsDesc: Select which accounts you want to import
importKeystore.errorDecrypt: Could not decrypt the Keystore file with the given password

importSeed.inputSeed: Your seed is the 15 words you saved when creating your account
importSeed.title: Import using seed

info.keepUp: Waves Keeper — is the safest way to interact with third-party web resources with Waves-integrated functionality or DApps. Using Waves Keeper, you can sign transactions and remain safe from malicious sites.

newAccount.passinfo: The password you entered will be stored locally. If you change device or lose your password, you will have to repeat the process of adding accounts to Waves Keeper. Waves does not store your passwords.

newAccountName.nameInfo: The account name will be known only to you

newWallet.selectInfo: This avatar is unique. You cannot change it later.
